Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.texture

A package for tile textures.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TileTexture
    An interface representing a system for drawing tiles.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedTileTexture
    An animated tile texture.
    BasicTileTexture
    A basic static tile texture.
    FilterTileTexture
    A tile texture that is filtered through a color based upon the hex value of their game state.
    GroupedTileTexture
    A tile texture made of multiple textures.
    NullTileTexture
    A texture that renders nothing.
    WindTexture
    A tile texture that is affected by wind.

Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.world2d.texture Description

A package for tile textures.
Author:
Tomaso2468
